name: Ben 10 Game Generator 5D
detailed_description:
Play and create with the latest instalment of Cartoon Network's Ben 10 Game Generator series. Help Ben through each level, using the power of the Omnitrix to evade puzzles, traps, obstacles and enemies. Transform into aliens such as Articguana, Gravattack, Heatblast, Shocksquash and XLR8, each with a special power to help you at different stages of your quest.

If that's not enough, get your thinking cap on and create your own levels for yourself and the community of Ben 10 fans worldwide! There are three game modes:

• PLAY – Battle your way through 50 levels with your best times published online.
• CREATE – Make your own levels with 60+ Game Elements and share them with the world.
• SEARCH – Download and play levels created by other players.

New to the 5D version are:

• 50 BRAND-NEW LEVELS!
Guide Ben through 50 new action-packed and challenging levels.

• TWO NEW CHARACTERS
Unleash the powers of Ripjaw and Upgrade, two new playable characters.

• ENHANCED FEATURES
Improved graphics and controls, a hints feature for tackling difficult levels, a new scorecard and an Omnitrix badge award for completing levels without using undo!

short_description: Play and create with the latest instalment of Cartoon Network's Ben 10 Game Generator series. Help Ben through each level, using the power of the Omnitrix to evade puzzles, traps, obstacles and enemies.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish, Arabic, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese-Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core HD Graphics 4000, NVIDIA 8800 GT, ATI Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Snow Leopard 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core HD Graphics 4000 (NOT 3000 it's too slow), Nvidia GeForce GT 330M, ATI Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 650M, AMD Radeon HD 6750M or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer, other unsupported distros may work
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0Ghz or equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel Core HD Graphics 4000, NVIDIA 8800 GT, ATI Radeon HD 4850 or better. Proprietary fglrx (stable) driver may be required for AMD/ATI.
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450, AMD Radeon HD 5670 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
